message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its high value and quality, I believe it would be a great addition to your collection. Considering its worth to me and the market value, I propose a price of $9,500 for the product. This offer is exclusive to you and includes a special warranty for a year. What do you think?

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the warranty and the quality of your product. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $8,500 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your situation and respect your offer. To make this deal more appealing, I would like to propose a compromise. How about we agree on a price of $9,000 for the product? This still allows you to acquire a high-quality item while accommodating your budget. I hope this suggestion works for you.

Hello Alice, thank you for considering my previous offer. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I am still unable to meet the price of $9,000. I am willing to offer $8,800 for the product. I hope this proposal is within your acceptable range.

Dear Bob, I appreciate your persistence and the effort to find a mutually beneficial agreement. I'm glad to hear that you're still interested in the product. Considering your latest offer and aiming to reach a fair compromise, I would like to suggest a price of $8,950 for the product. This offers a slight increase from your last proposal while still providing a good value for both of us. I hope this proposal is acceptable and looks forward to your response.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I am grateful for your flexibility. I am willing to offer $8,750 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Hello Bob, I'm glad to hear that you're still interested in the product. Thank you for your latest offer of $8,750. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, and I would like to suggest a price of $8,850 for the product. This offer includes an additional warranty extension for six months, which I believe will add value to your purchase. I hope this proposal meets your expectations and looks forward to your response.
Hello Alice, thank you for your proposal. I appreciate the additional warranty extension. I am willing to offer $8,700 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Dear Bob, I appreciate your continued interest in the product and your recent offer of $8,700. I understand your position and am willing to consider a compromise. In light of your offer, I would like to propose a price of $8,800 for the product. This includes the same warranty extension as previously discussed. I hope this proposal is within your acceptable range and looks forward to your response.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your efforts in negotiating. I am willing to offer $8,650 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
